attributes.action: a vote of no confidence and legal review.
attributes.additional_details:
This petition is calling for a vote of no confidence in the current government, due to the increasing economic attack on the working classes.
on the day that the bedroom tax kicks in, a tax break comes into effect for the wealthy worth up to £53000 per year.
there is currently around 200billion pounds in in uncollected and unpaid taxes, instead dla gets cut, housing benefit gets cut, full time jobs don't exist anymore and the poor continue to subsidies the rich.
enough is enough.

rejection.details: Votes of no confidence are a matter for Parliament not the Government.
